title: Zed overkill at pro play from 100-0
body:
Cass has not hit level 6 yet but it does not matter, zed just simply flashes to R and drops cass from 100-0 with 30% overkill damage
BALANCED BTW OMEGALUL and ll stylish still thinks the champ is weak xd he needs so many nerfs its not even funny.
[https://youtu.be/GgXw-9v0d1U?t=9](https://youtu.be/GgXw-9v0d1U?t=9)

Edit: for those who missed the point of this post. Before level 2 all ins became a thing you had to do these things called "trades" in lane where you poke each other and try to get each other down to like 50-70% health before  all ining. 

Point is damage is just stupidly high. even if cass rushed {{item:3191}} she would have still been overkilled THAT IS THE PROBLEM. i literally have 150k points on zed and i want him nerfed? why? cause it is not healthy for the game. 
TDL got massively buffed, ignite got massively buffed, lethality introduction. Assassins shouldnt overkill they should just kill.

It does not matter whether or not she had flashed she had no business being 130-0 mind you zed had half an item and only 6 points in his abilities. How does that warrant a 130-0 play? It is early game where you don't blow up anything that comes close to you.

[https://youtu.be/mnohyzibsv0?t=196](https://youtu.be/mnohyzibsv0?t=196) check those few seconds. brofresco hits a perfect W Q AND BARELY DOES ANY DAMAGE that is balance that is how damage should be. (inb4 lol he has no items) so you are saying dirk makes u go from 10% of enemies max hp to 50%? hmmm guess dirk needs a nerf then?

TLDR: nerf all assassins or lower damage by 30% overall in the entire game like you did with arurf on some champs. (this is coming from an assassin only main who plays pretty much nothing but assassins)

replies.body:
AD assassins were a whole lot more reasonable when lethality wasn’t a fucking thing on them, it’s literally half an item spike and you can start long sword to save on gold and then you just keep stacking more lethality and armour pen.

They were much better when they were building things like BotRK, BT, Tiamat

EDIT: Most common build path according to [u.gg](https://m.u.gg/lol/champions/zed/build/)

Duskblade, Mercs, Yommu, Black Cleaver, GA and LW.

21 + 18 + 7 (Sudden Impact) + 4% (24%) + 35%.

> [{quoted}](name=205181825,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrdXI73N,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-02-17T15:59:47.290+0000)
>
> AD assassins were a whole lot more reasonable when lethality wasn’t a fucking thing on them

https://i.imgur.com/617M4Im.png[\img]

You clearly did not play this game before lethality was a thing. Ether that or you do not remember this rush item.
Brutalizer was only one pen item compared to how much they have now

> [{quoted}](name=205181825,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrdXI73N,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2019-02-17T17:47:45.227+0000)
>
> Brutalizer was only one pen item compared to how much they have now

it's also a lvl 6 champion so expecting more than one pen item would be laughable and brutalizer gave way more than {{item:3134}} gave. Second assassins didn't even need the armor pen items to delete you before vs now where they are pretty much forced to build them. Assassins were free to build things that gave them more than just flat damage and they were still able to delete you. Now assassins have to choose between deleting you or doing next to no damage

1) I'm taking about overall build paths don't confuse this with one item. I'll explain this in the second point.

2) That's like saying AP assassins don't need_ much_ AP items to kill you, that wasn't the case. Pen items weren't in the best spot before lethality became a thing which is why you would've seen Zed players build things like BotRK, Tiamat, BT and one pen item (usually Yommus) compared to now and that one item only negated a flat 10/20. 

Of course lethality is a shitter mechanic but that's not what I'm trying to say, I'm trying to say the amount of pen granted now compared to before is too much and I'd rather have AD assassins building their old ways.

> [{quoted}](name=205181825,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrdXI73N,comment-id=00010001000000010000,timestamp=2019-02-17T19:09:10.571+0000)
>
> 1) I'm taking about overall build paths don't confuse this with one item. I'll explain this in the second point.
> 
> 2) That's like saying AP assassins don't need_ much_ AP items to kill you, that wasn't the case. Pen items weren't in the best spot before lethality became a thing which is why you would've seen Zed players build things like BotRK, Tiamat, BT and one pen item (usually Yommus) compared to now and that one item only negated a flat 10/20. 
> 
> Of course lethality is a shitter mechanic but that's not what I'm trying to say, I'm trying to say the amount of pen granted now compared to before is too much and I'd rather have AD assassins building their old ways.

the amount of armor pen that we have now is barely higher than what we had before. You want to know something else? You will get LESS armor pen/lethality up until late into the game since you don't get the full lethality until lvl 18. Sorry but I love when people actually think that somehow there is this massive amount of extra armor pen than what we had before... that is not the case at all. We have a slight very minor increase in lethality that is counter balanced by the fact that you do not get the full amount instantly but need to wait until lvls 13-18 to get them

AD assasins without lethality were stronger, remember S3 Zed being tier S for a long time?

No thanks, keep lethality.

> AD assasins without lethality were stronger, remember S3 Zed being tier S for a long time?

that's a good reason to revert lethality and assassins update, assassins are so shit right now

Gameplay Boards:

>Wants to go back to when lethality didn't exist forgetting that assasins were stronger back then

Me, an intelectual:

>Wants to keep lethality because as it is now, lethality make assasins worse

being an adc abuser doesn't mean being intelectual :(((

still boards are dumb indeed

Cass had no armor built and is naturally very squishy, Zed has a level advantage, Zed landed every single ability +an auto attack + multiple Q's + ignite + electrocute.

 Zed _must_ be broken because an assassin landing all his abilities on a squishy target with no armor while using electrocute and ignite shouldn't result in a kill.
Dont forget to mention that it happened because they forced Cassio flash on a gank earlier.
Careful, speaking like that will get you mass downvoted in these parts. Run before they catch you!

zed shouldn't be able to overkill by ~30% HP someone at this point of the game since he don't even have a bad trade with his Q/W E Q

she didn't have enough gold for a {{item:3191}} but even if she had she would have been overkilled for ~15%,still too much

honestly i'm one of those guys who always said that zed was weak,but that's too much

Again, hit by _every single ability at Zed's disposal._ Everybody is just glossing over that fact.

 She didn't have enough for a Seeker's Armguard but she had enough for a Blasting Wand and Faerie Charm? That's enough to buy boots and two cloth armors. That and her refillable potion + _not getting hit by every ability possible_ would have been more than enough for her to survive with. 

 If you think Zed's single target damage is too high, you need to give him more mobility, more resistances, or more AOE damage to make up for that.

Like idk why you are downvoted. Like more than 50% of the champions in the game that are primarily ability based and not supports could do the same thing if landing their entire kits at lvl 6 vs a lvl 5.

The downvotes don't bother me, I know it's just from salty bois who hate assassins.

 Note how nobody has responded to the fact that Cass should be punished for getting hit by everything under the sun, not playing safely, or building armor. It's because it doesn't fit their agenda :p

> [{quoted}](name=Hotarµ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrdXI73N,comment-id=000000030001,timestamp=2019-02-17T17:57:40.561+0000)
>
> The downvotes don't bother me, I know it's just from salty bois who hate assassins.
> 
>  Note how nobody has responded to the fact that Cass should be punished for getting hit by everything under the sun, not playing safely, or building armor. It's because it doesn't fit their agenda :p

It goes beyond just "salty bois who hate assassins", the strength of Assassins right now are completely effecting the meta. They are shoving mages out of mid lane and shoving tanks out of the meta because of they are shredding them with all the penetration they have.
damage problem is not a champion or a class, damage problem is the whole game all together.

>Cass has not hit level 6 yet but it does not matter

Are you serious right now?

 The only chance cass will ever have vs a zed is to prepare her ult for the moment zed reappears from his R animation which would be a 100% stun if timed right unless zed shadow swaps to a ready W shadow or burn flash (which he doesn't have because he used flash to get in range of R and W shadow wasn't on the ground already so he can't do the instant swap ether).  

But guess what? Zed engaged before she could get the minions needed for her level 6 to unlock her ONLY relevant CC ability and since Cass is **FLASHLESS** for whatever reason it would be absolutely dumb if she got out of that level 5 vs level 6 fight alive.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tU8QzsBzHa4 You see this? I completely disrespected the fact that zed could swap to that shadow and ult me. Why? Because 

A. His flash is down.

And

B. He had to swap to that shadow to ult me in the first place.

This results in the 100% CC situation zed players have to deal with that i just talked about. Of course Ahri's charm is easier to time than cass ult but my point still stands that a Cass can do this to a zed if she had her ult up.

Level six is a big power spike for most assassins and needs to be respected. Otherwise what's the point of picking them if they still cant do their damn job vs a flashless immobile mage.

The whole point of this thread is: Damage is off the charts. Zed with not even 1 fully built item over-damaged cass 130-0 within a second.

Now, if you'd check the other clip, you'd see how INSANELY BIG damage disparency is between those 2 seasons.

I am facepalming that one can miss the thread by so much.

This thread is actually sad.

**Zed's combo on immobile champions is unavoidable.** 

The slow from his shadow ensures the shurikens land. The only way it can not hit is if he misses; the target's skill is irrelevant, so trying to justify it with 'lol he landed everything' is the same as saying he deserves to one shot Cass with no counterplay because he has at least mediocre mechanical skill.

The ult was also completely unnecessary, he could have just W'd on top of Cass and auto'd her down in exchange for taking slightly more damage, which is the real problem with Zed. Laning against him as an immobile caster is a nightmare, and impossible if you're playing a champion that needs to auto to CS.
Yep  he is very bad design for a Competitive game like this.

The Zeds landed absolutely everything though.

Also, how is Zed going game win rate wise in pro play and normals?
I dont play Zed, but when I do I press R and roll my face on the keyboard and get a kill.

> [{quoted}](name=Eggbread,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrdXI73N,comment-id=0021,timestamp=2019-02-19T02:42:29.147+0000)
>
> The Zeds landed absolutely everything though.
> 
> Also, how is Zed going game win rate wise in pro play and normals?

How about late game zed like in my post before yours? He certainly didn't land all his.

That's ignoring that hitting every skillshot at point blank is literally is just holding your mouse on top of the enemy while casting all your spells.

> [{quoted}](name=Aametherar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrdXI73N,comment-id=00210000,timestamp=2019-02-19T02:58:37.277+0000)
>
> How about late game zed like in my post before yours? He certainly didn't land all his.
> 
> That's ignoring that hitting every skillshot at point blank is literally is just holding your mouse on top of the enemy while casting all your spells.

When Zed mains say "He hit every skillshot" argument its absolutely pathetic. If you miss all 3 shurikens and Es on a enemy that you are on top of because you have automatically teleported behind while being UNTARGETABLE, you cannot play ANY champion goddamit.

It is like if saying hitting a enemy with a Q that is sleeping from a Zoe E is challenger tier 1000000LP class play. It is fracking not.

I told the whole community. Zed mains who lobby here are scam artists which is the same to Shaco and rengars.
They done it for YEARS. Why listen to them?

instakilling someone:

#"LOOK AT THE MOVES! LOOK AT THE PLAYS!!"

exactly what LoL has become

refl

Yeah honestly
Even having Armor would have been waste 
that kill on Lee hurts a lot tho
Yeah ikr, 300 gold for 15 armor wouldn't do anything if Zed bough something with 1100 gold which negates 7 armor!

> [{quoted}](name=Zed genius,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrdXI73N,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-02-17T22:28:09.650+0000)
>
> Yeah ikr, 300 gold for 15 armor wouldn't do anything if Zed bough something with 1100 gold which negates 7 armor!

next time ill buy sunfire cape to counter zed in laning phase on my ap mage :) good idea

>
> next time ill buy sunfire cape to counter zed in laning phase on my ap mage :) good idea

? I was talking about a single cloth armor lol you really like to exaggerate on stuff

Zoe can do the exact same thing (and you can't even flash if she lands E)
Leblanc can do the exact same thing. 
Lissandra with fucking afterschock can do the exact same thing.
Annie can do the exact same thing.
Syndra can do the exact same thing.

The list goes on and on.
Zed is getting new skin
Yep

> [{quoted}](name=KittyKàtKàtàrinà,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BrdXI73N,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-02-17T15:49:32.412+0000)

> 
> It does not matter whether or not she had flashed she had no business being 130-0 mind you zed had half an item and only 6 points in his abilities. How does that warrant a 130-0 play? It is early game where you don't blow up anything that comes close to you.
> 
> [https://youtu.be/mnohyzibsv0?t=196](https://youtu.be/mnohyzibsv0?t=196) check those few seconds. brofresco hits a perfect W Q AND BARELY DOES ANY DAMAGE that is balance that is how damage should be. (inb4 lol he has no items) so you are saying dirk makes u go from 10% of enemies max hp to 50%? hmmm guess dirk needs a nerf then?
> 
> TLDR: nerf all assassins or lower damage by 30% overall in the entire game like you did with arurf on some champs. (this is coming from an assassin only main who plays pretty much nothing but assassins)

You think that's bad? I had a game with Amumu where Zed was melting me super late game...that's right, with the right build he has NO late game dropoff against tanks.

https://imgur.com/AjUax4Y

I still won, but the full build assassins should not be able to melt full build tanks...Every item I had was health, armor, or health and armor. (JG item was cinderhulk) This was WITH elixir of Iron. Zed had no elixir...

**Actually, Zed wasn't even full build, but I was. I also slowed it down enough so you could see how badly he missed his skillshots while melting me, as well as how the support was doing no damage.**

- Items at bottom (Plus iron elixir for amumu), Amumu stats on left.
- Zed didn't even use his item actives.
- Can't say I didn't build tanky enough, look how little damage I was doing to an "Assassin" ADC, and Support. Oh but "tanks are overloaded with base stats" lol.
- I'm not saying I should be crushing everyone in my path, I am a tank, but I certainly shouldn't be getting melted like that by an assassin because....well...I am a tank...This game lasted over 50 minutes just on my team having to play around a Zed and only won because his positioning was horrible which gave us ways to slow play around him.
- The opposing team was almost 100% AD, we had 4 bruiser/tanks and it took us over 50 mintues to close it out simply because defense is ineffective in league...
- We took 1 Rift Herald, 2 dragons and **FOUR** barons before we were finally able to close it out. We ended up closing it out by doing a 3 lane split push and not engaging. (Retreat any lane they attack and push others with minions) In short, we couldn't close out against them until we vocally communicated with eachother, and decided to let the minions carry us.

https://gfycat.com/LankyThoseKiskadee

Honestly, I originally never realized how bad zed was until I got him in a random mode and was able to win by just smashing QWER repeatedly while holding the mouse over opponents, not even knowing what my abilities did.

"Look at the moves, look at the plays" he literally held the mouse over his opponent while smashing all his keys...

(Retreat any lane they attack and push others with minions) In short, we couldn't close out against them until we vocally communicated with eachother, and decided to let the minions carry us.

> 
> Honestly, I originally never realized how bad zed was until I got him in a random mode and was able to win by just smashing QWER repeatedly while holding the mouse over opponents, not even knowing what my abilities did.

> "Look at the moves, look at the plays" he literally held the mouse over his opponent while smashing all his keys...

Back in season 4 you actually needed tiamat or bork or even both as Zed to oneshot. That is two additional imputs.
...These are now removed. He is low effort low risk now.

The whole stupid amount of damage on champions that go invisible is starting to make me not like League anymore.

I mean stupid damage and basically untargetable? When exactly does the fun start?

So many downvotes. So many zed mains

So many people repeat the very same phrase: "cass burned her flash" This alone explains that people commenting here don't even understand or bother to understand the issue of the thread.

**This thread is NOT about "ZED IS OP"**

**This thread is about "TOO MUCH DAMAGE"**

And one might think that message is simple enough to comprehend lel
That message is pretty fucking stupid to begin with.

Not at all? Did you watch the clip from S5? Can't you see damage disparency?
One has to be either blind or in favor of high damage to think the Zed clip was fine. And, again, it isn't about "ZED OP"
you do realize zed's Q does reduced damage when it hits through minions, right?

Some of Zeds Q and E hit right on the champion first, so damage was not decreased. But hell, you can look at any S2-3-4-5 games and see that damage was lower by alot.

Back then not every item you bought increased your AD/AP. Now? No matter if the item is utility or not IT HAS TO INCREASE THE DAMAGE. Actually it all started in S5, but was bearable still.

Lethality is a fucking joke, ad assassins were better without that garbage stat added to the game.
Bring back s3 paper dmg.

I'm gonna have to agree - back when I started league in S4, you traded alot before all-inning, now it's a matter of playing super safe or be 100 to zero'ed. I mean, even Riven/Jax at level 6 with Conq up can also burst a Darius, a supposedly beefy-ish champion, down 100 to zero, even when he's not behind. Couple that with mobility creep and the game has just become stupid af.

I started S4, and I truly miss how the state the game was in S5. 

S5 > S4 > S6 > S7 > S8, and apparently S9 is even worse... God fucking damnit, Riot.

Saying: With Flash would not happen this.

Yeah, everyone will have Flash anytime he combo. Same cooldown, totally.
People seem to forget that Lethality is _actually_ a post-nerfed Armor Penetration.

This is the perfect post to talk shit about cus of low skill thinking lol

But you can't rank shame because Riot don't like it
